focusingrange: Normal: 2.0 in. (5cm) - infinity (W), 4.3 ft. (1.3m) - infinity (T), Auto: 0 in (0cm) - infinity (W), 4.3 ft. (1.3m) - infinity (T), Sports: 3.3 ft. (1m) - infinity (W), 43 ft. (13m) - infinity (T), Macro AF: 0 in. - 1.6 ft. (0-50cm) (W)
continuousshooting: 1. Normal: Approx. 2.2 shots/sec. (in P mode) Approx. 13 shots/sec. (in High-Speed Burst HQ) 2. AF: Approx. 0.8 shots/sec. (in P mode) Approx. 4.1 shots/sec.(in High-Speed Burst HQ) 3. LV: Approx. 0.9 shots/sec. (in P mode) Under conditions where the flash does not fire automatically. Differs depending on the zoom position.
exposurecontrolmethod: Manual Exposure, Program Shift, Safety Shift, AE Lock
flashrange: 1.6 ft. - 18 ft. (W), 4.6 - 9.8 ft. (T) (50cm - 5.5m (W), (1.4m - 3m (T)) Image brightness may diminish depending on the shooting distance.
whitebalancecontrol: Auto, Daylight, Cloudy, Tungsten, Fluorescent, Fluorescent H, Flash, Underwater, Custom 1, Custom 2
lcdmonitor: 2.8-inch TFT Color Vari-angle LCD with wide viewing angle
shutterspeed: 1-1/2000 sec., 15-1/2000 sec. (in Tv and M modes)
builtinflash: Auto, Flash On, Slow Synchro, Flash Off- Facial brightness is also evaluated in Face Detect.
